label: candidate_sql_attempt
sql:
SELECT ts, id, json, text, (((
  COALESCE(
    JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(json, '$.content')),
    CAST(json AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8mb4),
    text,
    ''
  ) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci
 LIKE (? COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci)))) AS score
      FROM context
     WHERE id = ?
       AND (((
  COALESCE(
    JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(json, '$.content')),
    CAST(json AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8mb4),
    text,
    ''
  ) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci
 LIKE (? COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci))))
  ORDER BY ts ASC, id ASC
     LIMIT 15
